FuncDef:
The data-channel command creates an inter-chassis data channel group in virtual cluster mode and displays the data channel group view.
The undo data-channel command deletes an inter-chassis data channel group in virtual cluster mode.
By default,the inter-chassis data channel group in virtual cluster mode hasn't been created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a data channel group.
The value is an integer.

Specifies the ID of a chassis.
The value is 1 or 2.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When deploying virtual cluster, you must run the data-channel command to create an inter-chassis data channel group for data communication in virtual cluster mode.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
